snippet.title: CASTILLO Shattered Mirrors - Official Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Play now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1870970/CASTILLO_Shattered_Mirrors/

Battle legions of the undead in your quest to defeat Dracula with an arsenal of mythical weaponry. Enter dimensional gates through Dracula's castle and decide which worlds to enter, shards to collect, and bosses to defeat.

Created by Jackson Clayton and featuring the amazing voice acting talents of Conn “SC4REBEAR” McKenzie
